column4: I recently updated Dapper and now my sound is broken.  It loops the first bit of any file it tries to play.  I have a VIA 8237 integrated sound.  Anybody else have this problem?
Awesome:  It works with the live CD and was working before the update so I assume it's not a hardware problem
Stupid question.  Does changing the xorg.conf file affect sound?  I changed this on my machine before the sound died.
